A digital world (en): It s extremely naive to think that new generations, because they were born into a world permeated by digital tools, wouldn t need training adapted to the technological environment determined by these tools. It s a bit like saying that, since we were all born in an age when agriculture had been practiced for millennia, it doesn t require any form of apprenticeship, and that we are therefore all farmers, simply because we were born in an age of agriculture!
